answer:
TB skin test services vary across BC and may be available through a local health unit, doctors' office, pharmacy or travel health clinic. In BC, most people will have to pay for the TB skin test, unless they are eligible for the publicly-funded (free) test. Use our Health Unit Finder to find a health unit near you.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## TB skin test services vary across BC and may be available through a local health unit, doctors' office, pharmacy or travel health clinic.


## In BC, most people will have to pay for the TB skin test, unless they are eligible for the publicly-funded (free) test.

Use our Health Unit Finder to find a health unit near you.
Immunization Nurse
question: Can I get a TB test done here? I need it to go to university.
question_variation_0: can you get a tb test for university
